plot outline: A man reunites with his parents after 18 years and moves in with them. He falls in love with his new neighbour and gets friendly with a painter, but when he becomes witness to a crime, his life radically changes. How will his future unfold?
title: Just Aakasmika
plot: A man reunites with his parents after 18 years and moves in with them. He falls in love with his new neighbour and gets friendly with a painter, but when he becomes witness to a crime, his life radically changes. How will his future unfold?
